  • Info

Car

Unfortunately there is no public parking available at the museum and limited parking in Greenwich town centre. However there is blue badge parking area available in the car park on the corner of Park Row and Romney Road.

Bus

The following buses all pass through Greenwich town centre 177, 180, 188, 199, 286, 386. For further information visit tfl.gov.uk

Train

The nearest train stations are Greenwich and Maze Hill. From Greenwich station it is about a 10min walk through Greenwich town centre and about 8 mins walk from Maze Hill. The nearest DLR station is Cutty Sark for Maritime Greenwich, a 5min walk from the museum.

River

All boats arrive at Greenwich Pier which is just a 5min walk away.

13 — 17 September 2017 — National Maritime Museum, Greenwich
